greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 1; for n > 1, a(n) = n - A079277(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(A285710(n)) = A000010(A285710(n)). [A285710 gives all such matches.]
mathematica: Table[n - If[n <= 2, n - 1, Module[{k = n - 2, e = Floor@ Log2@ n}, While[PowerMod[n, e, k] != 0, k--]; k]], {n, 100}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Apr 26 2017 *)
program: def a007947(n): return max(i for i in divisors(n) if core(i) == i)
def a(n): return 1 if n<2 else n - a079277(n)
print([a(n) for n in range(1, 101)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Apr 26 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 26 2017
